To view a complete list of FAQs, . click here GIVE A GIFT IN GOOD TASTE Buy Gift Cards Now More about bonefish grill at North Charleston Your local North Charleston, SC Bonefish Grill® specializes in hand-cut, wood-grilled specialties and locally crafted Partner Selection dishes made with the freshest, highest-quality ingredients. The restaurant offers a selection of classic and signature hand-crafted cocktails, using just-squeezed juices, edible garnishes, and house infusions in addition to offering a distinct list of wines, which are the perfect match for any food pairing. Located near the Charleston International Airport on International Blvd and across from the Charleston Convention Center Managing Partner: NATE SHAW Instagram Facebook Twitter TikTok BonefishGrill.com Get directions to Bonefish Grill at 5041 International Blvd. North Charleston, SC Find a Location
